info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: Snow White's Apple
collection.openText: When the day a ripe apple fell off the tree in the garden where the princess and the king stood, the witch's heart was shattered.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was normal, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a normal probability.
When the work result was bad, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a high probability.
After escaping from the containment unit, $0 has spread its roots in the ground, shooting up branches inside the corridor. The branches of $0 slowed down the employees, hampering their movement.

After the corridor was filled with branches, $0 moved on to another corridor to make more branches. $0 has been suppressed and returned to normal, but $0's branches covering the corridor didn’t disappear until the next day.
